definitions.gu3: thigh; part of a whole; portion of a sum; (stock) share; strand of a thread; low-level administrative unit, translated as 'section' or 'department' etc, ranked below 科[ke1]; classifier for long winding things like ropes, rivers etc; classifier for smoke, smells etc: thread, puff, whiff; classifier for bands of people, gangs etc; classifier for sudden forceful actions;
